subject: Haunted Times Magazine: Top 10 Most Haunted!
author: Christopher Moon
full_text:
Stop by: http://www.hauntedtimes.com to check out the FREE fall online 
issue of Haunted Times Magazine! Also make sure to subscribe to the 
print magazine while you are there. This print issue features HTM's 
Top 10 Most Haunted!

Haunted Times Magazine your connection to the other side.
